summary: As a 25-year war between Russia and Sweden concludes, two brothers who are part of an effort to outline new border accords become undone by their actions, and their mistreatment of a young woman during their journey.
cast: Ville Virtanen|Tommi Eronen|Viktor Klimenko|Rain Tolk|Kari Ketonen|Sonja Petäjäjärvi|Vilhelmiina Virkkunen|Taisto Reimaluoto|Ismo Kallio|Kati Outinen|Dick Idman|Ivo Kubecka|Elena Leeve|Elena Spirina|Peter Holmlund|Asko Vainio|Timo Halonen|Eero Jaakkola|Aleksei Kettunen|Juha Linna|Stefano Pallanza|Antti Eskola|Markku Salo|Heikki Tuomaala|Ari Wirta|Tarmo Leppänen|Kari Nurmi|Olavi Kari
title: Sauna
